sentences.en: Dan burned to know what the reason could be.
Dan exchanged a knowing look with Harry.
sentences.cn: 丹和哈丽心照不宣地交换了一下眼神。

sentences.en: Dan fell about and slapped his thighs.
sentences.cn: 丹笑得前仰后合，直拍大腿。

sentences.en: Dan found out that I had been meeting my ex-boyfriend in secret.
sentences.cn: 丹发现我一直在跟前男友偷偷见面。

sentences.en: Dan informed her that he would be out back on the patio cleaning his shoes.
sentences.cn: 丹告诉她说他要去房子后面的露台上擦鞋。

sentences.en: Dan made a break for his car only to find the driver's door locked.
sentences.cn: 丹朝他的汽车跑去，却发现驾驶座位置的门被锁住了。

sentences.en: Dan played with the tangerine peel, letting it uncoil and then coil again.
sentences.cn: 丹摆弄着那片橘子皮，将它不停地展开来卷回去。

sentences.en: Dan smiled at him through a haze of smoke and steaming coffee.
sentences.cn: 丹透过烟雾和咖啡的热气朝他笑了笑。

sentences.en: Dan was in his cabin, staring out of a porthole.
sentences.cn: 丹在自己的船舱里朝舱外凝视着。

sentences.en: He had to lean on Dan to keep from falling.
sentences.cn: 他不得不靠在丹身上以免摔倒。

sentences.en: He proceeded to give Dan directions to the computer room.
sentences.cn: 他接着告诉丹去计算机房该怎么走。

sentences.en: I squared it with Dan, who said it was all right so long as I was back next Monday morning.
sentences.cn: 我征得了丹的同意，他说只要我下周一早上能回来就行。

sentences.en: Let's move to another subject, Dan.
The passing of the years has been kind to Dan. He looks like a man of half his age.
sentences.cn: 岁月对丹很仁慈，他看起来只有他年龄的一半大。

sentences.en: Why shouldn't Dan eat the cake? After all, he baked it.
sentences.cn: 为什么丹不该吃蛋糕? 不管怎么说还是他做的呢.

words.tran_cn: 段（围棋、柔道、空手道等运动员的技艺等级）；浮标
